DensityOfCO2P[EUVI_,SZA_,theta_,z_]:=(20.118989275679915*(1 + 0.34742820234329586*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]])*EUVI^0.5600285338757924)/(E^((-300 + z)/(46.95524008172754 - 0.4394866147443754*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 13.229313704018331*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 5.06196806861315*EUVI + ((41.5891085629896 + 0.5346928889747931*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 21.307738783803007*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 9.300620690528534*EUVI)*(-300 + z))/300))*Sec[Degree*SZA]^0.15129566389427562)
